channel.title: Katherine McCallum's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Katherine McCallum's Personal Website

item.title: Applied Bioinformatics Schistosomiasis Research
item.description: This project looks into the gene expression variations between liver and intestinal parasitic worms. The goal is to determine if current research is reliable even though it is done on liver worms.

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: Automated Morphometry
item.description: This poster is an overview of automated morphometry research to determine adaptations that plants have made to survive in their environment.

item.title: still a work in progress
item.description: This poster looks into the gene expression variations between liver and intestinal parasitic worms. The goal is to determine if current research is reliable even though it is done on liver worms.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Mathematics Department Scheduling Optimization
item.description: This poster is on the optimization of the Mathematics Department Scheduling process using linear programming.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
